title: Jasmine Pearl Tea
description: Hand-rolled green tea scented with fresh jasmine blossoms.
longDescription: Jasmine Pearl Tea is a premium green tea that is hand-rolled into small pearls and scented with fresh jasmine blossoms. The tea is made using traditional methods, where the jasmine flowers are layered with the tea leaves, allowing the leaves to absorb the delicate floral aroma. The infusion is light yellow-green with a sweet, floral aroma and a smooth, refreshing flavor. The taste is subtly sweet with a hint of jasmine, making it a perfect choice for those who enjoy floral teas.
brewingInstructions: Use water at 175°F (80°C). Steep for 2-3 minutes. Can be infused multiple times.
